pages.text: To help you in your journey, this book will introduce you to the wide range of content available in this pack. A variety of technological, magical and exploration mods are available to give each player choices about how to address their challenges in this pack.

This pack is optimized towards $(bold)servers$() and we tried to prevent having mods that burden the server too much. It is also made for players which like to play in a somewhat more challenging environment. A variety of monsters is present to make your life more difficult, albeit still providing a reasonable game that is fun to play.

Keep in mind that you can and will die from time to time; but a grave will always be generated containing all your hard-earned items. Your death position will be marked on your map, so you will not really lose anything.
